name: Dungeon Clicker (itch) (spadeyus)
description:
The game is non-commercial, was made by me as a high-school project in pygame using Python. It is definitely a bad game with a lot to add and polish,  but I wanted to save my first ever game just to look back on it in the future.

Characters were made by luizmelo (https://luizmelo.itch.io)

Icons were made by Kyrise (https://kyrise.itch.io)
